text:
Model BDM-1200-LV/BDM-1600-LV
BDM-1200-LV/BDM-1600-LV PV Input Voltage Range 20~60V
Micro Inverter Start-up Voltage 25V
Rated AC Output Current 10A
Rated AC Output Power 1200W 1600W
PF >0.99 ( )
THDi <5%
Efficiency
Features
US UL1741. SB certification AC Short-circuit Protection YES
Plug-and-Play Wall Outlet for DIY Installation
Installs in minutes by plugging directly into a standard wall outlet (120V)
Triple PV Inputs for Maximum Energy Harvest
RSD YES
Connect 4 solar panels (up to 00W each) to a single inverter, with adaptive
voltage tracking to optimize output across shading, angles, or mixed panel General
conditions. BDM-1600-LV Dimensions(W*H*D) 321mm*271mm*42.5mm
UL 1741 & IEEE 1547 Certified
Fully compliant with U.S. grid safety and interoperability standards
Scalable 1200W Output with High Efficiency
Generate up to 1.2kW continuous power per inverter
Operating Temperature Range -40~65
Built-in WiFi & Intuitive Mobile App ℃
Storage Temperature Range -40~85
Monitor real-time performance, troubleshoot issues, and receive alerts via a ℃
smartphone app (iOS/Android), with over-the-air firmware updates for future-proofing. Communication Interface WI-FI, Bluetooth
Rooftop Solution Solution
UL STD.1741,1741SA,1741SB IEEE STD.1547,1547.1,1547a HECO SRD-IEEE-1547.1:2020 Ed.2.0
CSA STD.C22.2 No.107.1 and 330 IEEE 2030.5 E5000,SA17-18; PCS CRD:2019
